Label: project name
Description: The project name

Label: project identifier
Description: Local identifier of the project

Label: funder
Description: The name of the funding body of the project and the URL
Example values:
funder:
- name: H2020
  url: www.example.org
  grant-agreement: ABC123456
- name: AHRC
  url: www.another.org
  grant-agreement: ABC234

Label: funder name
Description: The name of the funder

Label: funder URL
Description: Link to the funder organisation web site

Label: grant agreement
Description: Identifier of the grant agreement relative to the funding organisation

Label: has part
Description: List of components that are parts of this project. Refer to components with organisation, repo and local id of the component

Label: ro crate
Description: Specifies whether this yaml file is the reference file for creating a RO crate.

Label: component ID
Description: The ID of the component in the Ecosystem. Can be a local identifier or a URI.

Label: resource
Description: The digital resource representing the component (e.g. if the component is of type Dataset, it may be my-dataset.csv or a folder in the repository). It includes the path to a file (if 1 file), the path to a folder (if many files), or absolute URL of an online file (DOI cannot be used)

Label: DOI
Description: The DOI of the GitHub repository related to this component, e.g. as published on Zenodo.org

Label: name
Description: The name of the component

Label: description
Description: A text describing the component
Example values: musoW is the registry of musical resources on the Web.

Label: type
Description: The component type, according to the list of components available in Reeco.
Example values:
Dataset, Project, Registry, Workflow, Software
(see component types)

Label:
release 
date
Description: The date the component was released. Accepted values include any valid XSD date.

Label:
release 
number
Description: Version number of the release. Any value is permitted, although we recommend semantic versioning: https://semver.org/

Label: release link
Description: Link to access or download the component release

Label: changelog
Description: Link to a Changelog document, a file which contains a chronologically ordered list of notable changes for each version of the component.

Label: licence
Description: Link to a licence document of the resource, or a string pointing to one of the supported licences in the Reeco framework.

Label: image
Description: Link to one reference image illustrating the component

Label: logo
Description: Logo of the component in Web format. Accepted image formats are JPEG and PNG.

Label: demo
Description: Link to an online demo of the component

Label:
running 
instance
Description: Link to a running instance of the component (e.g. a software or service) on the Web.

Label: contributors
Description: A list of contributors in the form: "Name <name.surname@mail.com>"
Example values:
- John Doe <john@doe.com>
- Mick1234 <mick1234@mail.com>
- Fabio009 <http://fabio009.com>
- github/enridaga
- Name Surname
- Name Surname <email>
- Name Surname <URI>
- Name Surname <URI> <ORCID>
- Name Surname <URI|email|ORCID>*
schema:
could be several
https://schema.org/accountablePerson
https://schema.org/author 
https://schema.org/contributor

Label:
related 
component
Description: List of components that are related to this one. Use a subproperty when applicable.
Example values:
related-component:
- informed-by: component-local-11
- use-case: 
   - component-local-12
   - component-local-13
- story: [ story1, story2 ]
schema:
could be several:
https://schema.org/supportingData 
https://schema.org/isBasedOn
https://schema.org/usageInfo
SPAR:
cito:usesDataFrom / cito:providesDataFor
cito:usesMethodIn / cito:providesMethodFor
cito:isExtendedBy / cito:extends

Label: informed by
Description: The component was informed by another component (or resource), for example, a requirements document or a Persona, a Story, a use case, etc...

Label: use case
Description: Link to one or more use cases. This term is a specialisation of 'informed-by'

Label: story
Description: Link to one or more user stories. This term is a specialisation of 'informed-by'.

Label: persona
Description: Link to one or more persona. This term is a specialisation of 'informed-by'.

Label: documentation
Description: Link to the documentation of the component.

Label: evaluated in
Description: Link to a document (e.g. a user study) or source code demonstrating the validity of the component.

Label: extends
Description: Link to a software that is extended by the current component. Can be a component or an external software.

Label:
reuses 
software
Description: Link to a software that is reuses as-is by the current component. Can be a component or an external software.

Label:
reuses 
dataset
Description: Link to a dataset that is reused by the current component. Can be a component or an external dataset.

Label:
serves data 
from
Description: Link to a dataset that is served by the current component (e.g. an API). Can be a component or an external dataset.

Label:
produces 
dataset
Description: Link to a dataset that is produced by the current component (e.g. an algorithm for generative text). Can be a component or an external dataset.

Label: reused in
Description: Link to a software, dataset, or any other component that reuses the current component.

Label: generated by
Description: Link to a software, dataset, or any other component that produced or generated the current component.

Label: bibliography
Description:
List of bibliographic references that are relevant to the component but that do not fall under a specific category. 
Use "scientific work" for the main scholarly publication related to the component
Example values:
bibliography:
  - main-publication: full citation
  - technical-report:
    - http://doi.org/10.xxxx 
  - deliverable-document: 
    - http://something.pdf

Label: published in
Description: Link to a meaningful venue where the current component is served or published (e.g. a dataset published on a web portal).

Label:
main 
publication
Description: The primary, peer reviewed scientific publication related to this component (if non peer-reviewed, use technical-report instead).

Label: main technical report
Description: The primary document related to this component (if peer-reviewed publication, use scientific-work instead).

Label: deliverable document
Description: Link to the deliverable document related to this component

Label:
work 
package
Description: The work package associated to this component, if any.

Label: pilot
Description: A pilot application or case study

Label: project
Description: The local id of the project
